Welcome to Neuro Network

Igniting creativity and independent thinking in kids aged 5-16. Our unconventional classes inspire curiosity and foster a love for learning.

Our Mission

Our mission at Neuro Network is to ensure School Readiness and Reading Readiness for every child, regardless of their background or circumstances. Located in the vibrant city of Melbourne, Australia, our innovative program caters to children aged two to five years, as well as older children who have already experienced the transformative benefits of our approach. Through our dedicated efforts, we aim to empower young minds, laying a solid foundation for their academic journey and fostering a lifelong love for learning.

Our Approach

Learning Through Play

Nuturing Creativity

Developing Social Skills

Fostering Independance

Promoting a Love of Learning

Our History

Neuro Network was founded in 2005 by two passionate educators who wanted to create a different kind of preschool experience. They believed that children learn best when they are actively engaged in the learning process, and that traditional one-size-fits-all approaches to education were not meeting the needs of all children. They set out to create a program that would provide a more holistic and personalized approach to early childhood education, one that would foster creativity, critical thinking, and a love of learning. Since then, Neuro Network has grown to include multiple locations across the country and has continued to evolve and innovate in response to the changing needs of children and families.
Learn More

Our Message

Dear Parents, In the midst of our busy lives, parenting is an exciting challenge. Every parent wants to do their best in fully preparing their children for school and life. Neuro Network is based in Melbourne, Australia. We offer a Developmental Wellness program that achieves School Readiness and Reading Readiness for all children. It is primarily designed for children aged two to five years and is also applicable to older children who have benefited from our program. It can be done at home, in classrooms or in groups.

Join many other empowered parents who are excited about Neuro Networkâ€™s approach and the progress they see in their children. Go to our Enrol page to learn more. Neuro Network offers you options and choices for your own School Readiness & Reading Readiness program at home. Enrol in a program where you need to spend about fifteen to thirty minutes a day with your child, using methods and resources provided to you. Neuro Network has been successfully running this program for several years and this website gives you an opportunity to find out more. Look forward to hearing from you.
